entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
